subject: Baseball
Decisions and Verdicts
Frauds and Swindling
lead_paragraph: The Mets owners Fred Wilpon and Saul Katz will face a jury should there be a trial in the case filed against them by the trustee for the victims of Bernard L. Madoff’s fraud, a judge ruled.
snippet: The Mets owners Fred Wilpon and Saul Katz will face a jury should there be a trial in the case filed against them by the trustee for the victims of Bernard L. Madoff’s fraud, a judge ruled.
